summary: This is an email from a lawyer at Akin Gump Strauss Hauer & Feld LLP transmitting an additional production of documents from Deutsche Bank to the SDNY in response to a July 11, 2019 subpoena. It includes a cover letter and a large encrypted file attachment.

persons.name: Thomas Moyer
persons.context: The sender of the email who is using Citrix Files to share documents securely on behalf of Deutsche Bank. The email signature indicates he is with the law firm Akin Gump Strauss Hauer & Feld LLP.

events.title: SDNY Subpoena to Deutsche Bank
events.description: The U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (SDNY) issued a subpoena to Deutsche Bank for documents.

events.title: Deutsche Bank Document Production to SDNY
events.description: Deutsche Bank, through its legal counsel, submitted an additional production of documents to the SDNY in response to the July 11 subpoena.

keyFacts: Deutsche Bank was under subpoena from the SDNY (U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York) in the Epstein investigation as of July 2019.
The bank's legal counsel, Akin Gump Strauss Hauer & Feld LLP, was handling the document production to the government.
The production on August 2, 2019, was substantial, involving a 219.8 MB encrypted zip file.
The communication confirms an ongoing, formal legal process between a major financial institution (Deutsche Bank) and federal prosecutors investigating Epstein.
